description: Exciting the senses with exotic flavors, textures and colors, Sharbat drinks originate from recipes hidden in the history of ancient Persia. Our Sharbat drink has ancient origins as an elixir of life that restores spiritual and physical balance through unique and tasty combinations of herbs and other natural ingredients. At Sharbat Republic, we bring the magical experience to you through a series of specialty hot and cold sharbats, Tasty Persian sandwiches, which are also good choices for vegetarians, in addition to other seasonal items. “Lift your spirit with every sip.”
name: Sharbat Republic
